content: the 2 stocking st row to *** 176 sts then continue as follows work 24 row of the lichen pattern twice and then row 1 12 again 60 row the 14 row of reversed stocking st & moss stitch panel followed by 2 stocking st row 328 sts work row 1 12 of the lichen st pattern 352 sts work the 14 row of reversed stocking st & moss st panel from * to ** 380 sts deeper border continuing making increases at side edges only row 1 8 knit bobble on rs purlwise loosely as given for medium shawl block see note below and enjoy blocking note i don t block my textured shawls very strongly so that i don t flatten the stitches i dampen it and lay it flat smoothing it into shape when using blocking wires i only exert a little gauge also it helps on garter edges such as the border with this shawl if you weave the wires through the inside leg of the edge st on the ws about every 5 sts as it helps to prevent bumps i lay the shawl rs up and just flip the edge to ws to do this before laying it flat again large version lichen & moss shawl page 4 charts note the lichen pattern chart shows right hand side of shawl only and no edge or centre sts are shown after working the centre 8 sts work the pattern chart again then the 4 edge sts on left side for medium shawl work the lichen pattern 2 times then row 1 12 again moss st panel once 2 row stocking st lichen pattern once then row 1 12 again moss st panel once lastly work the border as given on p 4 for large shawl work the lichen pattern 2 times then row 1 12 again moss st panel once 2 row stocking st two times in total 328 sts lichen pattern row 1 12 moss st panel once lastly work the deeper border as given on p 4 version 0 2 lichen & moss shawl page 5
